div.bibl: Magyar Tribune, Nov. 22, 1918. HUNGARIAN LIBERTY HOLIDAY

body.p: On November 24 at 2 P.M. the Chicago-Hungarians will celebrate Liberty Day. The Hungarians in Chicago can be proud of the fact that there are people who are interested in the welfare of relatives and friends who were left behind, and feel the importance of this change in government in Hungary.
We are with them, we all will be present to help celebrate the Holiday of the Hungarians of the United States and Europe.
